website_summaries.verdict: Attractive curtains that block out a lot of light, minus occasional gaps.
pros: A top choice for consumers seeking a simple design and decent light blockage
cons: Light tends to shine in around the edges of the curtains

customer_reviews.title: It’s only one panel, even though it shows 2 at a window, misleading!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because I received 1 panel. I ordered the matching one and it could not be sent. Therefore I had 1 panel and could not finish my windows. The picture online showed 2 curtains and I thought 2 would come together. That was misleading. Also, when I could get only one I had to return the other because would not have enough to finish my bedroom window.
customer_reviews.author: RebEva2

customer_reviews.title: Light comes through the warped edges
customer_reviews.text: In the area that is directly covering light, yes, nothing shines through. However, even after ironing, the edges curl awkwardly and therefore do not come together in the middle and the light shines through no matter what I stick in front of it to hold it down flat. It’s lole the panels aren’t rectangular. They’re warped. It needs to be sewn better.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire

customer_reviews.title: Legit Blackout
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are awesome! They block out all the light and I tested it first by using my phone light and nothing came through. Room stays really dark. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: The work!
customer_reviews.text: The really do block out all light. Very happy with this purchase. Still trying to get out the wrinkles, however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting great sleep now
customer_reviews.text: It definitely darkened the room and now I sleep too long 😂
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture that have both sides
customer_reviews.text: It only comes one curtain!!! Not like the picture that have both sides. It’s just one single curtain for more than 30$ and now I had to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are in my RV in Alaska. With 24 ...
customer_reviews.text: These are in my RV in Alaska. With 24 hours of summer sunlight, I have tested them well. They DO block out the midnight sun. I sew, so I cut and hemmed them to fit my rv windows.
customer_reviews.author: Ho'oiloPele

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Could have been wider. The white side (facing outwards) causes light to bounce off the white and onto the wall, and back out in to the room. Probably not a solvable problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one panel
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews! They ship only one panel. It is not a curtain but a curtain panel. You have to go down to the bottom of the specifications to see it is "1." Very misleading. I knew when I got the package, however. This is because the package says "Window Curtain PANEL" something left out of all the descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. DiMichele

customer_reviews.title: No light peeks threw
customer_reviews.text: Perfect keeps out light 100%. Cuts noise but can still hear some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the darkness
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains. They are the perfect black out curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Alineko

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about these is the color. The material is like or a hotel window liner. They are on a closet self.
customer_reviews.author: Taralyn

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It is not totally block, but enough block for me.
customer_reviews.author: chan

customer_reviews.title: Great curtain
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what the product description states. It's a nice looking, well made blackout curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: put these up in my daughters room and they work great to darken it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Actually black out. Buy these
customer_reviews.text: I originally found these at Fred Meyer. They are the best black out curtains I've found. They actually block the light. They had a little tester spot where you can try to shine your phone light through it. You can't see the light at all! Yeah you might get a glow around the edge of the window, but that's normal. You could tape/pin them to the wall if you want. Yes they kind of have a plastic backing, and yes they are a little bit expensive (one panel per package) but they are thick and actually work. I bought them for all our bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: They really work
customer_reviews.text: these suckers really block out the light .not much for style but are made well
customer_reviews.author: gunderbum

product_meta.title: Maytex Smart Curtains Sheridan 100 Percent Blackout Window Panel, 50 x 84, 50 inches x 84 inches, Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue| Size:50 inches x 84 inches| Style:Grommet

The Smart Curtains Ultimate Light Blocker window panel is certified to block 100 percent of light*.

Save on energy costs and reduce noise. Features a woven basket pattern on solid fabric. 

Upscale grommet construction. 1 panel per package - we recommend using 2 panels for standard size window opening. 

Machine washable for easy care. 

*Claim based upon independent testing of smart curtains versus the standard blackout curtain.
feature_bullets: ELIMINATES 100 PERCENT OF LIGHT - Blocks 100 Percent of light. Great for daytime sleepers, children's rooms, and nurseries
SAVES ENERGY - Saves on energy costs keeping your room cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter
REDUCES NOISE - Reduces noise so you can sleep and rest better in a quiet, peaceful environment
DESIGN - Features a woven basket weave pattern on solid fabric. Upscale grommet construction fits standard size window openings
1 PANEL PER PACKAGE - We recommend using two panels for a standard window opening

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars37 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
